column1: # Name: Total long-term unemployment rate, Total

# Definition: Long-term unemployment rate for males and females. Long-term unemployment is all unemployed persons with continuous periods of unemployment extending for one year or longer; it is expressed as a percentage of the overall labour force to create the long-term unemployment rate.
# Source: International Labour Organization (ILO) Key Indicators of the Labour Market (KILM)
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
